eventName: Where Vernal Winds Will Never Blow
storyInfo: In a critical moment, Huai Tianpei steps forward and defeats the leader of the Shanhaizhong, seeing father and daughter reunited at last. At the same time, the real Catastrophe data makes its way to Zuo Xuanliao. In order to reach the capital in time, Zuo Xuanliao decides to let Yumen face the Catastrophe head-on.

attributes.content: Someone! Anyone!
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: You again! Didn't we just let you out?
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: Keep making noise, and it's no more Mr. Nice Guy!
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: Daizi!
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: This box is holding something that can save the city, so shut up and give it to Zuo.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: This is... data for the Imperial Astronomical Bureau? And a token?
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: Girl? How did this come into your possession? Hey, wake up!
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: Hurry! Call the medic!
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: Where... where exactly did this woman come from?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Has Superintendent Ch'en finally met her match?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Chi Xiao can't cut through her Arts.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: If you can even call it Arts in the first place...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: She doesn't seem to know any kung fu, but her swordplay is ridiculously quick.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: It's like the kind of kung fu you find in those fake 'forbidden techniques' manuals that say they'll teach you transcend space and time.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: I'll trade a few more blows with her and see if I can figure it out...
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Careful now, she's not playing with us.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Slip up once and you might die.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Even if you don't, you still will.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Boss

attributes.content: You want a few more rounds with me? Sure, let's start with you.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Boss

attributes.content: This time, her blade flies quicker than in their previous bouts. Waai Fu can only feel the autumn wind brushing against her face, leaving her no time to react.
Suddenly, a wall appears in front of her, or rather, a man's back as thick and wide as a wall.
Waai Fu looks at the wall in front of her that she last saw over a decade ago. Still, the sight overlaps with the one in her memories.
The reunion comes sooner than she expected, and catches her off guard.
So this is the one Lee mentioned, the one who's been bothering everyone?
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: You again?
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Boss

attributes.content: Turns out I've been sleeping bad because I was about to run into someone I'd rather not see.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Huai Tianpei sweeps a quick glance behind him.
His movements are light and quick, but Waai Fu catches them perfectly clearly.
I didn't want to fight anybody until my match with the Grandmaster.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: *sigh*... Guess today's a cheat day.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: So yeah, you've got some skills, but I can't say I know any kung fu school where you bully your juniors for practice.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: If you're itching for a fight, I'll take you on!
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Huai, you're at a disadvantage unarmed. I'll lend you my sword.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Don't need it.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Anything my fists can't break, a sword won't cut either.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Don't overestimate yourself.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Boss

attributes.content: Haah—!
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Waai Fu gets a front row seat to the action.
Sidestep, chop, quick step, twist, elbow strike. All moves she has learned herself.
Seeing the pained expression on his opponent's face, it is clear that Huai Tianpei is using his full strength.
Waai Fu imagines what it feels like to be slammed into a wall.
Right...
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: That's some blade. I dodged it by a hair, but it caught my skin.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Damn you—
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Boss

attributes.content: After being knocked back several feet, the woman steadies herself with her blade. The tremendous impact seems to have little lasting effect on her, as she lifts her sword again and assumes a defensive stance.
But being knocked off-balance has made her furious, and anger whips into a tangible wind, with everyone present feeling a chill run up their spines at the same time.
The moonlight intensifies.
Still got more tricks under her sleeve?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: This sensation again...
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Oh? Her Qi feels different... Great, let's go for another round!
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: (low-pitched hissing)
attributes.name: Di Beast

attributes.content: The woman raises her head and glances toward the sky, the clouds drifting across and obscuring half the moonlight.
She lowers her half-raised blade.
Since the girl already delivered the data, I'm not going bother with you any longer.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Boss

attributes.content: It doesn't matter. You're out of time.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Boss

attributes.content: Yumen city won't escape this calamity.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Boss

attributes.content: Seems like we weren't needed.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: We did witness a splendid showdown, though, so I wouldn't say it was a waste.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: The young will surpass us in time.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: I assumed you were referring to that fellow.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I'd say Ch'en here has already learned a good chunk of what you have to offer.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: What do you think of her swordplay?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Skillful, but not yet the peak of perfection.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: So what you mean to say is...
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Brother Meng—!
A sorrowful howl resounds through the long and deserted street.
Back at the agency, Waai Fu saw plenty of soap operas depicting children reunited with their parents.
Some cried bitterly while others threw furniture around, the actors' intense performances felt strange and unfamiliar to Waai Fu.
When watching with Hung or Lee, they would always silently change the channel.

She tried to imagine what it would be like when she saw him again. The pent-up resentment, anger, confusion, and dissatisfaction that accumulated over a decade... How would she express herself to him?
But at this very moment, the man standing right in front of her feels less real than the cold wind blowing on her face.
You came to my rescue, so thanks for that.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Sure...
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Anything else you'd like to say?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: I'm good.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Then prepare yourself.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Dad, what does 'Hung Mei Wing Chun' mean?
Of all the countless kung fu styles under Heaven, you choose this one, huh? Alright, I'll teach you this one.
Which style do you use, dad? I want to learn the same one as you.
I'll teach you mine, but not now. You still haven't mastered the basics. Once you've got a solid foundation, then you can learn my kung fu.
Okay!
I've sparred with him so many times that I've lost count.
The moment our fists connect, my arm adapts with my muscle memory. More submerged memories also flow out from my mind.
A small courtyard with blue brick and stone flooring, a large porcelain water jar always filled full, wooden stakes wrapped with cloth... and a tall figure whose face could never be clearly seen.
That was my world, day after day, diligently practicing and enduring hardships, year after year, cultivating my mind and tempering my character.
My sparring partner changed from my father to a wooden dummy, never letting myself rest, even for a day. Over the past decade, practicing kung fu became as natural as eating and sleeping.
I think I asked him the question.
'Why?'
Why did you teach me kung fu, why did you have me become a warrior just like you?
The intertwining of moves and techniques, the simple and genuine connection.
You've taught me so much.
But I was never chasing you.
I've found my own goals, I know why I practice kung fu, and I won't change the path I chose just because a man's back popped up in front of me.
And I will surpass you.
A fist lands on the man's robust chest, as if hitting a thick wall.
It gives off a muffled sound.
You've improved over the years, but you're still a long way from matching me.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Big talk. But I wouldn't have even landed a hit on you back then.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: If this is as far as you've come in a dozen years, then I'll catch up to you real soon.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: My daughter enjoys some big talk.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: That's not a compliment.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: I lose.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Huai Tianpei twirls his beard, thinks for a long time, and suddenly bursts into laughter.
That move where you kicked me in the chin doesn't look like anything I taught you.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: ...What fun.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Anyway, I'm heading back to the clinic.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Huai, wait a second.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Do you need me for something?
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Where is the Grandmaster's sword? And Zuo Le?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: The sword's with the girl, and that mandarin boy probably went after her.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Can't say for sure. I'm pretty much done with all this stuff.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Wait.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: The Grandmaster wants to see you.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: I've been going easy on you, since you're Anasa.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: But hand over the sword now, or I'll show no mercy.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: *cough*...
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Her wound reopens, and the young Anasa girl holds the sword in front of her chest with her left hand, throwing her chakram with her right, barely deflecting the enemy's attack.
She falls back step by step, as her arms feel heavier and heavier.
It just occurred to me that even if I let you go, you still need a way out.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: How did you know I would be here?
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: I grew up here.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I was a mischievous boy who tried to sneak out of the city through the sand sluices, and was duly punished by my father for doing so.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: But only someone as stubborn as you would dare take this way.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: You still want to stop me.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Tell me, did you come to Yumen just for this sword?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: And you wish to present the sword as an offering?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: And after that, will you return it?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Well, I...
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Yes, I will.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: That eccentric from the clinic promised me earlier that if you broke your word, he would bring you back himself.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: But having said all that, retrieving the sword was, and still is, my duty.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: So while I have no qualms about taking you at your word, just this once, I will get that sword back, even if I have to jump into the sand sluice myself.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: 'Yi nuo qian jin.' You may not know the idiom, literally 'a promise worth a thousand gold.' Break your word, and I will drag you back here, personally.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: ...Alright.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: You're wasting your effort. Hurt as she is, she'll die when she jumps down there.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: Three quarters past the Hour of Yu... the turbines should have slowed down by now, there's no time to waste.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Get going!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: The young Candleholder turns around to face his powerful foe, and a light gleams from his sword unsheathing.
The young Anasa girl hugs the sword tightly in her arms, and leaps down into the churning sand.
The observatory has recalculated its results according to the information we have just received.
attributes.name: Imperial Astronomical Bureau Representative

attributes.content: The Catastrophe has manifested as a sandstorm, and its scale is about three times larger than the one that struck the city four years ago.
attributes.name: Imperial Astronomical Bureau Representative

attributes.content: The prior misinformation has already cost us too much time, so the situation is not optimistic...
attributes.name: Imperial Astronomical Bureau Representative

attributes.content: Zuo Xuanliao looks at the box in his hands, the surface clearly worn down by gravel and sand.
A few days ago, was there another person looking at this box just as he is now? How did he feel?
If there was a mirror in his military tent, Zuo Xuanliao would have noticed the strands of silver hair on his scalp multiplying over the past few days.
Let's get to the point.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Presently, Yumen is in the middle of the Catastrophe's trajectory, and won't be able to avoid it, even if we change course.
attributes.name: Imperial Astronomical Bureau Representative

attributes.content: We have but one method available to us. We can split Yumen up into blocks and disperse in different directions to evade the Catastrophe.
attributes.name: Imperial Astronomical Bureau Representative

attributes.content: How much time would that cost us?
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Reconnecting after separation, and returning to full speed, will probably take about six months.
attributes.name: Imperial Astronomical Bureau Representative

attributes.content: There's no time.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: It is the only feasible way to ensure the city's safety.
attributes.name: Imperial Astronomical Bureau Representative

attributes.content: It is not the city's safety we want to secure.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: The General lingers in his tent, the night outside his window still seemingly serene. The unseen danger lurks far away, but he knows it is still out there.
He has seen these sights for decades, but he has never loathed the vast desert as much as he does right now.
If we can only ensure the safety of our people...
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: General, you mean to...?
attributes.name: Imperial Astronomical Bureau Representative

attributes.content: Prepare the front for direct Catastrophe impact, and evacuate all civilians from the east side of the core city to the west for resettlement.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Activate all defensive fortifications, and station Imperial Astronomical Bureau Casters on the city walls to resist the aftershocks.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: How long will repairs take, after the fact?
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: General Zuo, the risk is too great...
attributes.name: Imperial Astronomical Bureau Representative

attributes.content: How long will they take?
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Repairing the front walls and some of the city's infrastructure will take... by a conservative estimate, three months.
attributes.name: Imperial Astronomical Bureau Representative

attributes.content: Sure...
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Time is of the essence, so I urge the General to make a decision as soon as possible.
attributes.name: Imperial Astronomical Bureau Representative

attributes.content: Mr. Liang?
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Have you come to shackle me, to ensure I don't act on my own?
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: I'm here to relay the Grand Tutor's opinion—to trust in General Zuo's judgement.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Very well.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Prepare to confront the Catastrophe.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao
